text: The 1931 Tour de Hongrie was the sixth edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 4 to 8 September 1931. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by István Liszkay. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1931 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 4 September | Budapest to Pécs | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 5 September | Pécs to Tapolca | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 6 September | Tapolca to Tapolca | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 7 September | Tapolca to Sopron | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text- align:right;" | 8 September | Sopron to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | BSE | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Postás | style="text-align:right;" | + 32' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Italy | style="text-align:right;" | + 34' 38" |} |} ==References== 1931 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
